page.title: 11LIFESTYLES IN/ROUND CHAGFORD
page.content: The general impression is one of relaxed affluence, with no signs of genuine poverty. People are able to follow a number of pursuits mentioned elsewhere, including{Twinning.} Chag_ ford is twinned with{Bretteville_sur_ {Laize, Calvados, France}and this gives various opportunities for exchanges of visitors. Each May{children and par_ {ents from Chagford School}go by coach and stay at the local school, and then a few weeks later the French visit our school.{ Adolescents}also exchange visits, staying with local families, as do the{adults.}This year's visits celebrate the 10th anniversary of the signing of the{Twinning Charter. }When in Bretteville, we are able to visit such places as{Arromanches (Normandy {War Museum), Bayeux, Caen and Paris.} We are conveniently placed to cross the Channel from Weymouth to Cherbourg
